short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly track and add checklists to GitHub PRs for better organization and productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this plugin to keep track of what you need to review in a pull request. Use the plugin button to add global checklists. Any PR you review after that point will have the globals by default which you can start marking as done.

You can additionally add individual check items for a specific pull request. The checklist will be preserved per pull request.

This currently only works on github.
